column1: Weighted MRI size (256, 128, 1) visualization in T2 of the skull of a man of 37 years old, of axial section n°139 starting at the base of the skull. We distinguishe clearly: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3096.8262 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4462.6465 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 375.7324 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 420.5566 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 134.4727 mm³, the left putamen of volume 143.7012 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 5.2734 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 104.1504 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3057.2754 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4399.3652 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 349.3652 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 457.4707 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 114.6973 mm³ and the right putamen of volume 154.2480 mm³.
